branchCategory.name: NC(D)G, Double Acting Single Rod, Port Option
branchCategory.description: The NCG series is an extremely durable, repairable round body cylinder that provides precision mounting, short overall length, light weight and high speed. The XC37 option is used where light loads need higher than standard speeds.
